meanings.definition: A metallic chemical element with the symbol Hn and atomic number 105.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study hahnium to learn more about its properties.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes hahnium as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: The curious robot mistook hahnium for gold in the lab.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of elements, hahnium shines brightly like a hidden gem.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of hahnium revolutionized our understanding of chemistry.

meanings.definition: A hahnium compound used in various industrial applications.
meanings.sent1: The factory produces hahnium for making strong alloys.
meanings.sent2: Engineers rely on hahnium compounds for their durability.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous worker accidentally spilled hahnium all over the workshop.
meanings.sent4: In the world of manufacturing, hahnium acts as a silent hero.
meanings.sent5: The industrial revolution was fueled by the versatility of hahnium compounds.
